dsm.parameters

Class DimRed

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsm.parameters.DimRed

  • public class DimRed
extends java.lang.Object
    The class representing the dimensionality reduction (DimRed) parameter of the DSM.

    Usage of this parameter:

    String DimRed: the feature transformation used
    • "NoDimRed": no dimensionality reduction
    • DimensionalityReductionType dimensionalityReductionParameter: the type of dimensionality reduction, with a Double parameter

    String DimensionalityReductionType: the type of dimensionality reduction
    • "IslamInkpen": the dimensionality reduction technique introduced by Islam and Inkpen (2008)
    • "TopNFeat": in each vector retaining only the features with the n highest weight
    • "SVD": singular value decomposition

      This function performs the dimensionality reduction based on the top N features (only the features with the N highest weight are kept, for all the other features, the weight is set to 0), for the given type of words.

    • Method Detail

      • dimRedTopFeatures

        public static void dimRedTopFeatures(DimRed.DimensionalityReductionType type,
                                     java.lang.Double n,
                                     boolean topFeaturesWithHighestWeights)
        This function performs the dimensionality reduction based on the top N features (only the features with the N highest weight are kept, for all the other features, the weight is set to 0).
        Parameters:
        type - the type of dimensionality reduction to be used
        n - the dimensionality reduction parameter (the number of features to be kept or a paramter for its calculation)
        topFeaturesWithHighestWeights - it indicates whether the top features are the ones with the highest weight (normally), or with the lowes weight (e.g. in case of the RANK feature transformation)

      • dimRedTopFeatures

        public static <V,X,Y,Z> void dimRedTopFeatures(DimRed.DimensionalityReductionType type,
                                               java.lang.Double n,
                                               boolean topFeaturesWithHighestWeights,
                                               java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> allWordSet,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap1,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap2,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap3,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap4,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> wordFrequencies,
                                               long allWordTypeCount)
        This function performs the dimensionality reduction based on the top N features (only the features with the N highest weight are kept, for all the other features, the weight is set to 0), for the given type of words.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap1
        X - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap2
        Y - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap3
        Z - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap4
        Parameters:
        type - the type of dimensionality reduction to be used
        n - the dimensionality reduction parameter (the number of features to be kept or a paramter for its calculation)
        topFeaturesWithHighestWeights - it indicates whether the top features are the ones with the highest weight (normally), or with the lowes weight (e.g. in case of the RANK feature transformation)
        allWordSet - the set containing all the input words of the given POS
        tuplesMap1 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap2 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap3 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap4 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        wordFrequencies - the map containing the frequency of words of a given POS
        allWordTypeCount - the number of all words with the given POS, for which a word vector in the extracted information exists

      • removeNonTopFeatures

        public static <V> void removeNonTopFeatures(java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> wordmap,
                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> wordConcatenatedMapOfFirstNElements,
                                            java.lang.String prefix)
        This function removes (sets their weight to 0) those (feature, value) pairs from the @param wordMap, that are not among the top N features (which are stored in @param wordConcatenatedMapOfFirstNElements.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param concatenatedList
        Parameters:
        wordmap - ther map, from which the non-top features will be removed
        wordConcatenatedMapOfFirstNElements - the concatenated list containing the top N features for a word
        prefix - a prefix for the feature keys used in @param concatenatedList

      • dimRedSVD

        public static void dimRedSVD(java.lang.Double n)
        This function performs the dimensionality reduction based on (truncated) Singular Value Decomposition (SVD).
        Parameters:
        n - the number of dimensions to which the vectors should be truncated

      • dimRedSVD

        public static <V,X,Y,Z> void dimRedSVD(java.lang.Double n,
                                       java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> allWordSet,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap1,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap2,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap3,
                                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap4,
                                       java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long> featureMap1,
                                       java.util.HashMap<X,java.lang.Long> featureMap2,
                                       java.util.HashMap<Y,java.lang.Long> featureMap3,
                                       java.util.HashMap<Z,java.lang.Long> featureMap4)
        This function performs the dimensionality reduction based on the top N features (only the features with the N highest weight are kept, for all the other features, the weight is set to 0), for the given type of words.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap1
        X - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap2
        Y - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap3
        Z - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap4
        Parameters:
        n - the number of dimensions to which the vectors should be truncated
        allWordSet - the set containing all the input words of the given POS
        tuplesMap1 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap2 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap3 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        tuplesMap4 - a map, in which (word, feature) pairs of a given type are stored
        featureMap1 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap2 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap3 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur
        featureMap4 - a map, in which the features of a given type are stored together with the number of word types with which they occur

      • matrixToString

        public static java.lang.String matrixToString(cern.colt.matrix.tdouble.DoubleMatrix2D m)

      • buildFeatureToFeatureNumberMap

        public static <V> int buildFeatureToFeatureNumberMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> featureToFeatureNumberMap,
                                                     java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long> featureMap,
                                                     java.lang.String prefix,
                                                     int featureNumber)
        This function builds the feature to feature number map using the features valus in @param featureMap, with the @param prefix added to the keys as prefix.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param wordMap
        Parameters:
        featureToFeatureNumberMap - feature to feature number map, to which the new features should be added
        featureMap - a map, which contains the features to be added to @param concatenatedList
        prefix - a prefix for the feature keys to be added to @param featureToFeatureNumberMap
        featureNumber - the starting feature number
        Returns:
        the ending feature number

      • addFeatureValuePairsToWordFeatureMatrix

        public static <V> void addFeatureValuePairsToWordFeatureMatrix(cern.colt.matrix.tdouble.impl.DenseDoubleMatrix2D wordFeatureMatrix,
                                                               java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> mapToBeAdded,
                                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> featureToFeatureNumberMap,
                                                               java.lang.String prefix,
                                                               int wordNumber)
        This function adds the (feature, value) pairs from the @param mapToBeAdded to the (word,feature) matrix @param wordFeatureMatrix, with the @param prefix added to the keys as prefix.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of keys in @param mapToBeAdded
        Parameters:
        wordFeatureMatrix - the (word,feature) matrix, to which the (feature, value) pairs should be added
        mapToBeAdded - a map, which contains the (feature, value) pairs to be added to @param featureToFeatureNumberMap
        featureToFeatureNumberMap - a map containing the feature to feature number mappings
        prefix - a prefix for the feature keys to be added to @param concatenatedList
        wordNumber - the number of the current word
